definition: markedly different from an accepted norm, a person whose behavior deviates from what is acceptable especially in sexual behavior
details:
adjective
- markedly different from an accepted norm
= synonyms: aberrant
noun
- a person whose behavior deviates from what is acceptable especially in sexual behavior
= synonyms: degenerate
- a person whose behavior upsets other people (pejorative)
= example: a person whose behavior upsets other people (pejorative)
